text:
August 31, 1954
Miss Anna Hyer, Department
of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth, NW
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Anns
I am just back from vacation and found the mateÂ¬
rial to look over and make suggestions on. Please
note the attached. I am rushing them to be sure that
they are not overlooked if you are close to press time.
Give me a ring if there are further questions.
Sorry to make this so brief, hit our best wishes
go along with it.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSscp
Enc
